action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the passenger entity.
action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the passenger entity.

bientity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on either the 'actor' (the entity being ridden) or the 'target' (the passenger entity) or both.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on either the 'actor' (the entity being ridden) or the 'target' (the passenger entity) or both.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by either the 'actor' (the entity being ridden) or the 'target' (the passenger entity) or both.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by either the 'actor' (the entity being ridden) or the 'target' (the passenger entity) or both.

recursive.description: If set to `true`, the specified action(s) will be executed on all the passenger entities.
recursive.markdownDescription: If set to `true`, the specified action(s) will be executed on all the passenger entities.

type.description:
## Passenger Action

---



[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/passenger_action)

Executes an action on the passengers of the entity.

Type ID: `origins:passenger_action`



---

### üìù Note

Not to be confused with [Riding Action](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/passenger_action)






---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:passenger_action",
    "action": {
        "type": "origins:heal",
        "amount": 2
    },
    "recursive": true
}
```

This example will heal all entities that are currently riding the entity that executed this entity action type.
